document.full_text: a former libyan foreign minister who muammar gaddafi had appointed as his u.n. ambassador, ali abdussalm treki, has refused to take up any official position and condemned the "spilling of blood."
document.title: senior libyan diplomat says quits over "bloodshed"
lines_and_colors: a former libyan foreign minister who muammar gaddafi had appointed as his u.n. ambassador, ali abdussalm treki, has refused to take up any official position and condemned the "spilling of blood."
